captions.text: Today the sun hid and refused to come out
he saw you wake up and was afraid to die
You opened your eyes and the sun put away his paintbrush
because you paint the landscape better than he.
When your beautifulness rises [in the morning]
any constellation becomes insecure.
Your beauty smells like morning
and feeds me throughout the whole week .
Your eyes do magic, they’re magicians. You opened them!
and now mountains reflect on the lakes.
The only absolute truth is
that when you were born trees bore fruit.
Sweet orange, a cherub’s harvest
because the sun was afraid, he hid in a cloud.
Today the sun is not needed, it’s in recess
you give me vitamin D with a kiss.
The moon goes for a walk following your pupils
night shines like the first time after you look at it.
No one knows anymore how to become happy through sorcery
because of you and your eyes.
You're a verse in reverse, a “re-verse”
you woke up and turned my universe around.
Now the summit can be reached by going down the mountain range
Earth no longer spins, you spin around the Earth.
Kisses are given out in war, there are no longer fights.
Today hens moo and cows cluck
fish and earthworms catch hooks
we fly through the sea and navigate the skies
flowers grow in the sand, rain falls over the desert
now dreams are for real because we dream when we’re awake
and that dream is assured, and that’s how it reproduces
and finally innocence doesn’t hide away from lights.
Food scarcity turns out to be delicious
because we have our bellies full of butterflies.
The galaxy reveals its hidden region
and it seems that in Earth life begins.
The moon goes for a walk following your pupils
night shines like the first time after you look at it.
No one knows anymore how to become happy through sorcery
because of you and your eyes.
And at the military academy they (now) teach medicine
and bankers give housing and food.
No one knows anymore how to become happy through sorcery
because of you and your eyes.

title: Calle 13 - Ojos Color Sol ft. Silvio Rodríguez

comments.text:
wow que mente tan..... tengo despues de el decir " ya nadie sabe ser feliz 
a costa del despojo" pense que la siguiente linia era algo mas depravado 
ahha﻿
comments.author: jlei8aX

comments.text:
Essa música é de uma sensibilidade extraordinária !! Conseguir captar todas 
as sensações do corpo em uma letra é algo de uma minuciosa capacidade!!

Visualmente todas as cores combinam e dançam entre si em harmonia, na 
verdade visualmente e musicalmente essa música é deliciosamente harmônica !!

Acho todas as letras,músicas e vídeos do La Calle 13 espetaculares e de 
cunho político abrangente( com exceção de atrévete—te—te, que 
particularmente não gosto),porém Los ojos color sol é para mim a mais bela 
dentr todas !!

Parabéns !!!﻿
comments.author: Clarissa Andrade

comments.text:
cancion hermosa, una de mis favoritas, me parece que Silvio brinda un 
homenaje a Hugo Chavez y se inspira en esa imagen que corrio en Venezuela 
de los ojos de Chavez.﻿
comments.author: E MORALES

comments.text: esto si es musica, arte en su estado mas puro﻿
comments.author: Sebastián Muñoz Donoso

comments.text:
No puedo dejar de escuchar esta canción, me hace sentir enamorada, hasta 
lágrimas me ha sacado, me encanta, es muy buena.﻿
comments.author: Estefania Vargas

comments.text: Gracias a ti y a tus ojos !!﻿
comments.author: Morgan Aguilar

comments.text:
Esta cancion es hermosa por que me la dedico mi pololo con el que ya 
cumplire un añitoo de relacion﻿
comments.author: Macarena Cuevas

comments.text:
Leo cada comentario en los que insultan y tratan de inferiores a los que 
expresaron (de manera inadecuada algunos, claro) que no les gustaba esta 
cancion, Silvio Rodriguez o Calle 13, y me da tanta risa.
Si ustedes son los fanaticos que los aman y entienden los mensajes de sus 
canciones, porque hacen eso? Ese es el mensaje que nos quieren dar estos 
musicos? "El que piensa distinto es menos" "Yo estoy en lo correcto, tu 
estas mal" "Viva la intolerancia, la discriminacion"? Son tan graciosos!
Paz.﻿

comments.text:
#dabeatday
El Maestro de estrofas que nacen de la perdida del unicornio azul y la 
potencia de las notas de protesta; me lleva a un nuevo viaje lúcido, 
recordándome  el no perder de vista lo más importante, hoy día  ¡¡¡Ahora 
los sueños son reales!!!
.... 

La luna sale a caminar, siguiendo tus pupilas.
La noche brilla original, después que tú la miras.
Ya nadie sabe ser feliz a costa del ¡despojo!
Gracias a tí...y a tus ojos... 
...
|Silvio Rodríguez​

♪♫ ^_^ ♫♪ Me encanto el vídeo y la interpretación ufff, no termino por 
describirme el estado de emociones, que me provoca﻿
